Details

A CommandTopic is a TopicEntry that handles a command directed at this actor (e.g. BOB, JUMP).

class CommandTopic :   CommandTopicHelper ActorTopicEntry

Properties  

includeInListOVERRIDDEN

actor.t[3598]

CommandTopics are included in the commandTopics list of their ActorTopicDatabase

matchDobj

actor.t[3587]

The direct and indirect objects I must match (individually or as one of a list) if this CommandTopic is to be matched.
